original_definition: 'digital photo frame' means an electronic display that displays exclusively still visual information;
generated_definition: 'digital photo frame' means an electronic device displaying digital images stored on a memory card or wirelessly transmitted from a device, typically with a touch-sensitive screen and built-in speakers.

Article 2: ‘digital photo frame’ means an electronic display that displays exclusively still visual information;
